short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop wasting time sorting through emails: Instantly know which of your emails needs a reply back.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never drop the ball again. Now you can know exactly which emails need a reply with Email Reply Status. 

You'll have an inbox indicator that will tell you: 
1. Which emails you need to reply to
2. The emails that you already replied to
3. Those that you don't need to reply to at all

*NOTE*: For best performances set Gmail page size to 50 emails or less.

It's a perfect tool for: 
✅ Small business owners
✅ Sales people
✅ Business people who are just too busy to keep track of emails
✅ Customer service representatives
✅ Customer support personnel 


With Email Reply Status, never miss another opportunity again!

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net/
App website: https://www.email-reply-status.com/
Pricing: https://www.email-reply-status.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-reply-status/
